DOC.brief_summary: This study address follow question : Does nizatidine affect pharmacokinetics metformin healthy volunteer ? Recent study Giacomini laboratory indicate nizatidine may block metformin elimination kidney inhibit organic cation transporter efflux metformin . The investigator hypothesize co-administration metformin nizatidine reduce renal clearance ( CLR ) metformin lead increase plasma concentration potential risk toxicity . Knowledge pharmacokinetic interaction profile metformin organic transporter inhibitor , nizatidine , important help develop safe effective drug therapy reduce side effect .
DOC.brief_title: Drug-Drug Interaction Study With Metformin Nizatidine
DOC.detailed_description: Screening Procedures : Prior enrollment , subject ask come Clinical Translational Science ( CTSI ) Clinical Research Centre ( CRC ) San Francisco General Hospital ( SFGH ) . The study protocol procedure explain detail , question answer , subject provide consent form sign . The screen visit conduct within 14 day first inpatient visit i.e . first metformin alone metformin nizatidine dose day . Only subject consent participate study screen procedure commence . All subject recruit study already consent pharmacogenomics ethnically diverse population ( SOPHIE ) study , previously establish cohort healthy people live San Francisco . A review subject 's medical history health questionnaire conduct re-assess health status confirm eligibility ( see attach health questionnaire ) . Changes medication drug use history note study . During screen visit , vital sign well blood urine sample take subject laboratory analysis . A single blood sample ( 10 mL ) take venipuncture measure complete blood count ( CBC ) , electrolytes , blood urea nitrogen ( BUN ) , creatinine , liver function test ( LFTs ) screen anemia renal hepatic insufficiency ( see Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria ) . Procedures During Main Study : An equal number subject randomize , computer program , one two study arm describe , prior screen visit . After least 1-week washout period , subject assign treatment arm . The duration study consist two 24-hour inpatient study visit ( 2 non-consecutive overnight stay ) , separate least 1-week wash period . Randomized Study Visit Day 1 : Metformin alone Subjects report CRC approximately 7:30 AM , overnight fast least 10 hour ( fast approximately 10:00 PM ) . Vital sign brief history take upon arrival . If inclusion/exclusion criterion meet , one intravenous ( IV ) catheter insert forearm vein facilitate blood sample . An initial blood sample 10 mL drawn ( IV line ) determination plasma metformin , creatinine , nizatidine concentration prior administration metformin ( i.e . baseline measurement ) . Next , subject receive oral dose 850 mg metformin 8 oz water . Blood sample ( 5 mL ) drawn 0.5 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 2.5 , 3 , 3.5 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 10 , 12 , 24 hour post-dose determination plasma metformin nizatidine concentration . An additional 5 mL blood draw 6-hour 12-hour time point measurement serum creatinine allow calculation creatinine clearance ( CLcr ) . Blood sample obtain finger prick take 0 , 0.5 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 2.5 , 3 , 3.5 4 hour ingestion metformin ( total 0.1 mL ) measure blood glucose level . Additional biomarkers metformin/nizatidine response toxicity , plasma insulin , glucose AMPK activation , may also determine blood sample collect . Subjects remain CRC receive standardize meal start 4 hour post metformin dose . Subjects discharge allow go home follow morning collection last ( 24 hour ) blood urine sample approximately 8 AM . All blood sample centrifuge , plasma separate immediately store -80oC analysis . Urine collection : Subjects ask void bladder prior metformin administration ( baseline urine sample ) drink 8 oz water every 4 hour maintain urine flow pH . Aliquots urine collect following time frame : 0-2 , 2-4 , 4-8 , 8-12 , 12-24 hour post metformin dosing . Additionally , aliquots collection take 0-12 0-24 hour pool analysis creatinine . Subjects advise collect urine produce inpatient visit . The volume pH urine collection record aliquot ( 20 mL ) collection period store -80Â°C determination urinary metformin , creatinine , nizatidine nizatidine metabolite concentration . Randomized Study Visit Day 2 : Co-administration metformin nizatidine Subjects report CRC overnight fast previously describe . After collection baseline blood urine sample , subject receive oral dose 600 mg nizatidine 850 mg metformin 8 oz water . The study procedures describe `` Randomized Study Visit Day 1 '' `` Urine collection '' repeat . Study Restrictions : Concomitant Medications : The study require healthy participant refrain take medication ( except daily vitamins oral contraceptive ) duration study , particular medication ( ) interfere pharmacokinetics metformin nizatidine ( See Exclusion criterion 13.7 ) . Other Study Restrictions : Subjects require use adequate contraceptive mean avoid pregnancy throughout study . Subjects must remain within CRC throughout two 24 hour inpatient visit unless accompany CRC staff member . Subjects refrain smoke ingest caffeine , alcohol , orange grapefruit juice contain product night inpatient study day study complete , approximately 24 hour dose . Clinical Laboratory Determinations : Analytical Methods : Measurement metformin , creatinine , nizatidine nizatidine metabolite plasma urine preform High Performance Liquid Chromatography ( HPLC ) tandem mass spectrometry ( MS/MS ) , use assay previously describe validated20-22 . Hematology , Blood Chemistry Urinalysis : The follow standard biochemistry , blood chemistry urinalysis perform screening visit : 1 . Hematology , ( Complete Blood Count differential , CDP ) : WBC differential , red blood cell ( RBC ) , RBC index ( HGB , HCT , MCV , MCH , MCHC ) platelet count . 2 . Blood chemistry ( Metabolic Comprehensive Panel , METC ) : sodium , potassium , chloride , carbon dioxide , creatinine , blood urea nitrogen , glucose , calcium , bilirubin ( total ) , phosphate ( total ) , AST , ALT , albumin alkaline phosphatase 3 . Urinalysis : urine protein ( dipstick ) blood ( dipstick ) . Other : Pregnancy test : A urine test administer female first menstrual period make ensure pregnant . Pregnant female exclude study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1845 year 2 . Male female 3 . If female , use appropriate contraception 4 . Healthy judge medical examination , medical history normal biochemical hematological measure 5 . Normal urinalysis renal function 6 . Understand nature purpose study provide inform consent 1 . Pregnant lactate woman ( female subject urine pregnancy test screen visit ) 2 . Abnormal bone marrow function ( leukocyte , neutrophil , platelet count outside normal range ) 3 . History hypersensitivity allergic reaction metformin nizatidine 4 . Risk congestive heart failure require pharmacologic treatment ( medical history ) 5 . History renal hepatic dysfunction ( e.g. , CLcr < 60mL/min , ALT > 80U/L , AST > 60 U/L ) 6 . Anemic ( hemoglobin < 12 g/dL ) 7 . Use medication ( include counter product , herbal product , mineral supplement ) exception daily vitamin oral contraceptive . In particular use medication know interfere pharmacokinetics metformin nizatidine cimetidine , cetirizine , ketoconazole , procainamide , St. John 's Wort , testosterone prohibit . 8 . Laboratory parameter 2 standard deviation laboratory mean 9 . Subject carry MATE2K gene variant predict effect MATE2K protein expression
